messages.message:
Hi Folks, we have enabled billing on aihub.uat.instabase.com (http://aihub.uat.instabase.com).  As a result of this change, you might not be able to Build, Converse, or run Apps until you purchase Credits.  The process to purchasing Credits is fairly simple:
• Navigate to: https://aihub.uat.instabase.com/billing/payments
• Click on “Buy Units”.  This should bring up the “Buy Units” modal.
• In the Units to buy, fill in a large number so that your Credits don’t get used up quickly: 50K is a good number.
• Click on Proceed to payment details.  This will redirect you to checkout.stripe.com (http://checkout.stripe.com).
• In the checkout page:
    ◦ Use the following card number: 4242 4242 4242 4242
    ◦ Fill in the other details: might be random, but must pass basic validation
    ◦ Click Pay
• This should redirect you back to the aihub.uat page, and you should see an increase in your credits.
Please let us know if you run into any issues with this.
